item.title: Admin only item
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“butnugget, post:9, topic:174722”]so should it look like this?

if(wearID == 13595){ sendMessage("You need to be an admin to wield this."); void;return true; }

if so i got a error that says this V

client.java:15708: illegal start of expression void;return true; ^[/quote]

Err, perhaps you should Java conventions and basics before tackling servers. It should look like this:

if(wearID == 13595){
sendMessage("You need to be an admin to wield this.");
return true;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Admin only item

item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

im trying 2 make a item admin’s only

i don’t have

if (attackTimer > 0) {

so all i need to know is were would i put this?

if (messageTimer2 > 0) { messageTimer2 -= 1; } if (attackTimer > 0) { attackTimer -= 1; } if(playerRights < 2) { if((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ****)) { remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], playerWeapon); sendMessage("You need to be an admin to wield this."); } }

could any one help me?

side question: is there a way u could fix run were u can keep it on until u turned it off and/or u log out?
